column4: hi.  i am trying to set the class path by typing "export CLASSPATH=/usr/share/tomcat5.5/common/lib/jsp-api.jar;/usr/share/tomcat5.5/common/lib/servlet-api.jar" ... but i get the following error on shell startup --> "bash: /usr/share/tomcat5.5/common/lib/servlet-api.jar: Permission denied"->
I tried sudo export but same error...
